title: Personal Interest. Russian Movie. Detective Melodrama. English Subtitles. StarMediaEN
author: StarMediaEN
comment: Well, a simple plot actually. And yet it still lovely represents the reality of life. It's touching😍
Ótimo filme, só não posso dizer que entendi uma só palavra! Mas a história em si ,conta tudo. Gostei muito, principalmente no final!
Estamos  no Brasil  e  falamos português. Os filmes em outra  língua  precisa  ser dublados.  🤗😎😇😤🇦🇷😁💕💖

A few more movies like this one, and I will start to feel what Russian soul is all about.
Thank you for posting. A Slavic Canadian
I was just looking for a movie to improve my English and then I found a great Russian movie. I really enjoyed it, thank so much for sharing it with us. Greetings from Brazil 🎥🎬🍿😍
description:
Tatiana makes her escape from prison and seeks a hideout in a remote village of Pavlovka, in her late grandmother’s house. There she meets Maxim who has come to the village to take a break from the hectic city life. Instant chemistry sparks between them. Everything would be just fine were it not for Tatiana’s ex-boyfriend, Oleg, who comes to the village looking for her.Tatiana is forced to tell Maxim the whole truth about herself. She tells him about the robbery she committed together with Oleg and how she took all the blame on herself and then escaped from prison.Maxim assures her that he will be by her side no matter what and will help her get through all this. But things are not as simple as they seem, because Maxim isn’t who he pretends to be…

Type: film
Genre: detective melodrama
Year of production: 2015
Number of episodes: 90 minutes
Directed by: Anatoliy Grigor'ev
Written by: Alla Zagorodnya feat Anton Streltsov
Production designer: Mikhail Shevchenko
Director of photography: Aleksandr Krushtalovuch
Music by: Nikita Yanoschuk
Producers: Galina Khrapko, Vlad Ryashin
Cast: Galina Bezruk, Kirill Zhandarov, Aleksey Nagrudnuy, Viktor Kuznetsov, Irma Vitovskaya, Valeriy Bassel
